original_text: ‘You have heard the bad words that he has spoken against God. Do you think that he is guilty?’
korean_text: 그 신성 모독 하는 말을 너희가 들었도다 너희는 어떻게 생각하느냐 하니 그들이 다 예수를 사형에 해당한 자로 정죄하고

sentences.original_text: You have heard the bad words
that he has spoken against God
Do you think that he is guilty?
